name: SUNNOVA ENERGY INTERNATIONAL
sampleDescriptions: Introduce Sunnova to policymakers, support extension of solar tax credits, and highlight company initiatives to build a diverse solar workforce.
Educate policymakers about Sunnova; discuss issues related to solar.
Support extension of solar ITC and standalone storage ITC, including in H.R. 848 GREEN Act of 2021 and S.1298: Clean Energy for America Act.
Educate policymakers about Sunnova; discuss issues related to solar and options to make solar accessible and affordable to all households.
Educate policymakers on issues related to supply chain and the impact of potential tariffs.
